effect: When Wishiwashi is level 20 or higher and has more than 25% HP, it changes to School Form. In School Form, its stats are boosted. If its HP drops to 25% or below, it reverts to Solo Form.
notes: Only affects Wishiwashi. School Form has much higher base stats (620 total vs. 175 in Solo Form). Form change happens at the end of each turn based on HP threshold.
